title: Lambda Destinations to Lambda and SQS with SAM
description: Lambda function that on success sends message to another function and on failure to SQS using Lambda destinations with SAM

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to create a Lambda function that on success sends message to another function and on failure to SQS using Lambda destinations with SAM.
The AWS SAM template deploys the resources and the IAM permissions required to run the application.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Omar Rosadio
authors.bio: Cloud Engineer / AWS Community Builder in Serverless category.
